idea: Kiabza.com, launched by Kayman Ventures Pvt Ltd in May 2017, is a Re-Commerce website for people to buy and consign pre-owned branded fashion. Due to reach of information & technology, youngsters have started to appreciate Fashion Brands and aspire to buy them. India being a value market, Kiabza enables people to own sanitized Pre-owned Branded Clothes, in excellent condition, on the click of a button, at a fraction of their original prices. Also the new generation is completely open-minded about pre-owned clothing if hygiene is assured. Kiabza procures branded clothes from well-placed and fashion conscious Individual Consignors by encouraging them to earn some money for de-cluttering their wardrobes of their unwanted branded clothing. The Founder of Kiabza, Nohar Nath, has 20+ years of experience in Textile Recycling industry and therefore this aspect is a key differentiator. Kiabza also has a 100% Inventory based model which is much superior to the  business models of its small competition.
name: KIABZA

idea:
Vinture


Vinture Innovations is dedicated to turning imaginative ideas into leading furniture products that help save customer cost and time, utilize the residential and commercial space more effectively.


VINTURE founders have extensive experience in the construction and furniture industry.


Over some years of being involved with the construction of luxury homes, the VINTURE founders have seen a need for customised furnitures line with a broad selection of design choices, high-end finishes, along with top of the line organization, customer service, and quality. 


Vinture will meet these customers needs. 


With Vinture, customers can discover thousands of furniture designs for all types of rooms, personalize the design - by color, material, style - to their liking, and get the exact look for their homes in a matter of weeks.
name: VINTURE INNOVATIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
